articles.author: Sammy Mngqosini
articles.title: American MMA fighter Anthony 'Rumble' Johnson dies at 38 from undisclosed illness - CNN
articles.description: American MMA lightweight fighter Anthony 'Rumble' Johnson has died at the age of 38 from an undisclosed illness, according to Bellator MMA.
articles.content:
American MMA lightweight fighter Anthony Rumble Johnson has died at the age of 38 from an undisclosed illness, according to Bellator MMA.

articles.title: African American And Hispanic Audiences Spur ‘Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’ To $180 Million Opening Weekend - Forbes
articles.description: The Ryan Coogler directed “Black Panther: Wakanda Forever” now holds the record for the biggest movie opening in the month of November and opened to an estimated $180 million in North America. As the company continues to face headwinds, it seems like diverse …
